div.div: Monmouth College vs. Lake Forest College
at Lake Forest, Ill. | Farwell Field

tr.td: Lake Forest wins coin toss and will receive and defend east end zone.
Matt Batton kickoff 59 yards to the LFC11, Darrius McKay return 14 yards to the LFC25 (M. Lafferty;Bryan Mesik).
Pete Scaffidi pass complete to Mike Peters for 6 yards to the LFC31, out-of-bounds (Erik Weber).
